reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Miglioramento del business environment per le micro, piccole e medie imprese palestinesi - art. 7 L. 125/2014

description.narrative: This iniziative aims at improving the Palestinian business environment as well as the productivity of the Palestinian micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) to enhance Palestinian economic competitiveness.In particular it supports palestinian public institutions in strengthening their skills developing effective policies targeting the private sector by both creating a more conductive business environment and putting in place a series of mechanismsand iniziatives to facilitate MSMEs' acces to renewable energies in order to significantly reduce their production costs and improve their productivity

il progetto ha come obiettivo quello di contribuire al rafforzamento della competitività delle micro,piccole e medie imprese attraverso interventi volti a supportare le azioni delle istituzioni pubbliche palestinesi a miglioramento del business environment e della produttività con un attenzione alle condizioni in termini di accesso alle energie rinnovabili al fine di ridurre i costi di produzione attraverso una minore dipendenza energetica.

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
MOFP - Ministero delle Finanze e Pianificazione territori palestinesi

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services
Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
